text: Deck the halls with boughs of holly!

Fa la la la la, la la la la
‘Tis the season to be jolly!

Fa la la la la, la la la la
Plough the roads and drain the barrel

Fa la la la la, la la la la
Sing this ancient Yule-tide carol
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Take the lights and wrap them nicely
Fa la la la la, la la la la

We’ll decorate the tree precisely
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Put the star right at the top
Fa la la la la, la la la la

We don’t want the fun to stop
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Santa brought his sleigh to Gecko
Fa la la la la, la la la la

There’s something wrong, it’s going too
slow.

Fa la la la la, la la la la
Fix the sleigh and make it faster

Fa la la la la, la la la la
Vicky sees us zoom straight past her.
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Flying through the chilly evening
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Up and down we’re swiftly weaving
Fa la la la la, la la la la

Above the rooftops through the snow
Fa la la la la la la
Spreading joy with a Ho Ho Ho!
